name: MemoryLayout
desc: The memory layout of a type, describing its size, stride, and alignment.

items.name: size
items.desc: The contiguous memory footprint of T, in bytes.

items.name: alignment
items.desc: The default memory alignment of T, in bytes.

items.name: stride
items.desc: The number of bytes from the start of one instance of T to the start of the next when stored in contiguous memory or in an Array<T>.

items.name: stride
items.desc: Returns the number of bytes from the start of one instance of T to the start of the next when stored in contiguous memory or in an Array<T>.

items.name: size
items.desc: Returns the contiguous memory footprint of the given instance.

items.name: alignment
items.desc: Returns the default memory alignment of T.

items.name: offset
items.desc: Returns the offset of an inline stored property within a typeâ€™s in-memory representation.
